import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useForm, Controller } from 'react-hook-form' import { Container, Row, Column } from './styles' import { maskMoney } from '../../components/MaksMoney' interface IFormInput { salarioMensal: number percentualAporte: number aporteMensal: number rendaNecessaria: number } const FormCalc: React.FC = () => { const { control, handleSubmit, register, setValue, errors } = useForm< IFormInput >() const onSubmit = (data: IFormInput) => { console.log(data) } function onChangeRemunaration(e) { setValue('salarioMensal', maskMoney(e.target.value)) } useEffect(() => { console.log(errors) }, [errors]) return (
{errors.salarioMensal && 'Salário Mensal é obrigatório!'} ( )} /> ( )} /> ( )} />
) } export default FormCalc
